name: How About Spikes
description: How About Spikes is a 2D metroid-vania like platformer. Fight your way through enemies and a lot of spikes, while exploring the world of Garden Valley.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 (2 cores) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X compatible graphics card with 512mb vram DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: Controller is recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphicscard with >1gb vram DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: Controller is still recommended
